content:
# The attempt to harvest more iron ore has failed because there is "Nothing within reach to harvest." This suggests that I may have exhausted the nearby iron ore patch or that I am not positioned correctly to harvest it.
# 
# To resolve this, I should check the state of the iron ore patch and ensure that I am at the correct position to gather more resources. If the patch is indeed depleted, I will need to find another iron ore source.

# Checking the status of the nearest iron ore patch to see if it can still be harvested.
iron_patch = get_resource_patch(Resource.IronOre, nearest(Resource.IronOre))
print(f"Iron Patch Status: {iron_patch}")  # Displaying the status of the iron ore patch.
